extendedInfo.description: Dreamboard Mobile is the #1 digital dream journal app. 100% FREE, private, secure and confidential. The most fun and beautifully designed dreams app. Cannot remember your dreams? Want to analyze them? Lucid dreaming? Use Dreamboard Mobile on your Android smartphone and on the web. â¶ WITH DREAMBOARD YOU CAN... === Record your dreams in seconds === Log your dreams on your mobile when you wake by selecting a simple set of options like moods, feelings and colors and jot down a dream description. === Browse your dream journal === Create, annotate and browse your private personal dream journal. Past dreams are saved for you to read, rediscover and update at any time.=== Analyze dreams over time === Observe trends in their dreaming activity. Dreamboard finds similarities between past dreams, aggregates dream data in a private dashboard and gives users feedback about their dreams â¶ NEW IN DREAMBOARD! â Totally revamped UI â Very fast and "lightweight" app â Full synchronization of Dreamboard from Android to any device/tablet â Easy fast entry interface to add a new dream in second â Predefined tags and data, such as emotions, places, colors or people â Predefined dream symbols and archetypes â Add your own tags and descriptions â Ability to highlight recurrent dreams, lucid dreams or a dream series â Alarm clock with reminder/invitation to record your dream â Daily reminder/notification to record your dream â Full keyword search of your dream journal â Dashboard with stats and information about your dreams â Improved dream analysis and stats dashboard â Improved âdream treeâ graphical representation â Facebook and Twitter login â Complete privacy and security of your dream journal â¶ OUR USERS SAY... âI love the idea! i'm always googling the meaning of my dreams.â âHad actually been thinking about starting a dream journal again right before you sent me this-- I think this a great ideaâ âSo excited about learning my other life!! The dream world! a lot of our life is dreaming!â âI found the graphic design fun, peaceful and easy on the eyesâ âI LOVE this application, great concept! love your design.â âI always post my dreams on my web journal so this even better!!! thanks for creating this.â â@Dreamboard is pretty impressive. Much easier than pen and pencil dream-journaling. Can't wait to see what they add to their site.â â@Dreamboard Iâm excited to start my dream journal. YAY!â â¶ MORE INFO... Go to dreamboard.com for more info!Keywords: dream journal, dream tracking, psychology, lucid dreaming, healthcare

reviews.title: Please modify!!
reviews.comment: This is a wonderful app, but can you PLEASE add all the journal options available on the site to the mobile app, and EDIT option to submitted entries. PLEASE. Then this will be 5 stars.
reviews.author: Ayla Anna

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: I usually sleep a dreamless sleep so I literally suck at remembering my dreams if I suddenly had one. This was a nice tool for that. However, the edit option is greatly needed because no one wants to type a dream again and again.  Also, if the devs ever update the app, would you be kind enough to include what\'s new in what version just so we would know.
reviews.author: Mai Hearts

reviews.title: Terrible interface
reviews.comment: Kept losing data when navigating by pressing the back button. Very frustrating way to start the day. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Ian Morrison

reviews.title: what happened?
reviews.comment: used to be fabulous, but keep getting an error message and it wont save my dreams! if it wasnt for screen capture on my LG Intuition i wouldnt have it. what happened to my previous dream log, and why wont it save? back to 5 stars when fixed...
reviews.author: Deb Blaney

reviews.title: Bloody hell. Where do I start?
reviews.comment: I wanted this app to work. Really, I did. I wanted it to be good and to be friendly and usable and so make me want it to be the first thing I see each morning.  If you look at its purported features, then it sounds just terrific. You just try using them, though. Go on...I\'ll wait.  \"Log your dreams on your mobile when you wake by selecting a simple set of options\"  Yep, then watch the app suddenly drop you back to the login screen and you\'re left with a dream you\'ve only managed to describe as \"neutral\" and \"orange\".  \"Create, annotate and browse your private personal dream journal.\"  Note the absence of the word \"edit\". Did the app die, or unexpectedly drop you back to the login screen, while you were adding your dream? Hope you\'re happy to just \"annotate\" or \"browse\" the thing you listed as \"neutral\" and \"orange\", then. I mean, sure...you could just delete it and start again, but you know...that really is not the point, is it?  \"Observe trends in their dreaming activity.\"  Well, when I have a week\'s worth of dreams listed wherein all I\'ve managed to record is the f**king colour, watching trends develop should be a real revelation. Thanks for that.  Go elsewhere.
reviews.author: Kevin Davies

reviews.title: I would love to give this 5 stars
reviews.comment: I have loved this since I bumped into it and honestly,  I could see the value in it being a paid app for constant and consistent support.  Beautiful interface,  great way to non obtrusivly recall the dream...  I mean,  wow.  Best and easiest journal to keep up with.  Short or long,  I can jot down what my dream was.  Here\'s the gripe,  and it\'s the only one.  I use this on my note 10.1 tablet and for some reason as of late when I go into the things category I get a \"this program has stopped responding\"
reviews.author: DeAnthony Herbert

reviews.title: Promising and good idea but needs work
reviews.comment: This app seems great because you can record color and mood and people but I have issues. I tried to record more than one dream and the stats for both show up on the dreamboard but the second dream is nowhere to be found. So not so great if you want to go back and read your dreams. I\'ve also had it crash and freeze on me and seeing up my account was buggy.
reviews.author: Ashley Maloney

reviews.title: Good but has its downs
reviews.comment: Its really cool and this is one app I would hate to give 4 or less stars but I keep getting sign in errors and there has been no good updates to it
reviews.author: Gianni Lopez

reviews.title: Cannot connect to server
reviews.comment: It\'s barely usable because it almost always cannot connect to the server please fix!
reviews.author: Eamon Miller

reviews.title: Well designed, needs more options.
reviews.comment: Beautiful app needing options to edit dream entries, share previously entered dreams. I had an error uploading my first dream and had to reenter. Would be nice if the app would save a local copy before uploading so this doesn\'t happen. Thank you!
reviews.author: Adam Parsons

reviews.title: Good start, but...
reviews.comment: This app is nearly unusable without an edit function. Copy/paste and share are also must-have features. I will go back to hand-writing mine for now; it is too hard to deal with the issues in this app before I forget my dream!
reviews.author: Tara Spitzen

reviews.title: Could be WAY better
reviews.comment: You can\'t go back and edit your dreams.  The \"theme\" option is missing.  Those are just little things but they are SO annoying.
reviews.author: Carrie Gold

reviews.title: For the love of goodness, add an edit option
reviews.comment: The app looks great, but it had happended TWICE now that I was writing a dream and I hit submit by accident. Now only half my dream is on their and I cannot edit it! It is not that hard, add an edit function asap!!
reviews.author: kilbeam99

reviews.title: A bit hit and miss...
reviews.comment: I really want to love this app, but it is missing some of the features that the website offers. 1 bonus star though since the app runs faster than the website does!
reviews.author: Helena Halikias

reviews.title: I had reserved my initial judgement
reviews.comment: I have had this app for a while and was really getting to like it and the way it encouraged me to actually KEEP a dream journal. However the most recent update completely wiped all of the previously saved data, erasing months of tracking. For that sleight i have to give a one.
reviews.author: Anthony Baum

reviews.title: I really wanted to like this app
reviews.comment: This application is beautiful and has a fantastic concept, but nearly none of the features that I downloaded it for work. I got a new phone and now I can\'t log back into my account, even though I can see all my information online. The alarm only works if you set it around 10 minutes after the current time.. And I can\'t edit my dreams? It\'s not worth the space this is taking up. I hope they eventually fix this, because I really think that this application could go somewhere.
reviews.author: Amanda Mathews

reviews.title: Login error
reviews.comment: Android 4.3. I get a pretty nasty error and cannot login. :(  It looks like it would be a beautiful app.
reviews.author: Mike Earley

reviews.title: It\'s ok
reviews.comment: Should be allowed to edit dreams after published/added
reviews.author: Josue Hernandez

reviews.title: Eh
reviews.comment: Can\'t figure out how to update a dream that was previously uploaded.
reviews.author: Nicole Kinney

reviews.title: A good start
reviews.comment: I like this, but I shouldn\'t need internet to use it. It would also be nice to be able to edit a dream or change the date. Also, it\'d be nice to see my dream tree.
reviews.author: Jennifer Koenig
